title: WMBackend Node Server
description: This is a NodeJs server that handles all the backend APIs for my personal website. It includes best practices such as proper error handling, rate limiters, proper encryption and hashing, etc.

content.name: .eslintrc.json
index.js
package-lock.json
package.json
content.content:
{
  "name": "waldomilanesappbackend",
  "description": "API Server for Waldo milanes",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node ./index.js",
    "nodemon": "nodemon ./index.js",
    "test": "test",
    "heroku": "git push heroku  master",
    "serve": "firebase serve --only functions"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "bcrypt": "^5.0.0",
    "body-parser": "^1.19.0",
    "cookie-parser": "^1.4.5",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "express-rate-limit": "^5.1.3",
    "helmet": "^3.22.0",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.5.1",
    "mongoose": "^5.9.10",
    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    "nodemailer": "^6.4.10",
    "pug": "^3.0.0",
    "validator": "^13.1.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "dotenv": "^8.2.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^14.2.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.22.0",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.4"
  },
  "private": true,
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "main": "index.js",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/waldo237/waldoMilanesAppBackEnd.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "portfolio",
    "waldo",
    "milanes",
    "w-programming",
    "node",
    "server",
    "express",
    "mongodb",
    "mongoose"
  ],
  "author": "Waldo Milanes",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/waldo237/waldoMilanesAppBackEnd/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/waldo237/waldoMilanesAppBackEnd#readme"
}

content.name: articleController.js
emailController.js
passwordResetController.js
passwordResetEmailInHTML.js
content.content:
/* eslint-disable no-tabs */ /** * @function passwordResetEmailInHTML return an html body in text * @param {*} passwordResetURL a url where the email will redirect * @param {*} user a valid user to personalize the email. */ exports.passwordResetEmailInHTML = (passwordResetURL, user) => `

waldomilanes.com 
password reset request
Hello, ${user.firstName}

Someone requested that the password for your waldomilanes.com account be reset.

Reset My Password


This link is good until today at ${new Date(Date.now() + 600000).toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })} and can only be used once.

If you didn't request this, you can ignore this email or let us know. Your password won't change until you create a new password.
Ⓒ 2019- ${new Date().getFullYear()}   | W PROGRAMMING |  waldomilanes.com
developed by Waldo Milanes ®
`;

content.content:
/* eslint-disable no-underscore-dangle */ exports.verificationEmailInHTML = (host, user, token) => `

w-programming 
Waldo Milanes
Thanks for signing up to my blog, ${user.firstName}! 
Please verify your email address to get access to all my work..
Verify Email Now
Ⓒ 2019- ${new Date().getFullYear()}   | W PROGRAMMING |  waldomilanes.com
developed by Waldo Milanes ®
`;

content.content:
html
  head
    title= title
    link(rel="icon" href="https://waldomilanes.com/static/banner-4d5315b8096076bc4a718bbdf689c72b.png")
    style
      include css/App.css
      include css/index.css
      include css/Title.css
      include css/Footer.css
      
  body
    div(class='app light')
      header(class="header primary shadow" id="header")
        article(class="title")
          div
            img(src='https://waldomilanes.com/static/banner-4d5315b8096076bc4a718bbdf689c72b.png' alt="WM robot" class="mw-robot")
          h1(class="secondary--text double-w") W
          h3(class="programming") PROGRAMMING
          
        
        div(class="page-main-container light")
          div(class="main-title contact-title")
          article(class="card-container article-card" style=`background-color:${(successful)?'lightgreen':'pink'} ; display:flex; flex-direction:column; padding:10px`)
            h1(class='primary--text title-font')= type
            div
              p(class='primary--text title-font')= message
          if(link)
            a(href=link)
              button(type="button"  class="btn submit-btn primary" style="padding:15px 28px" href=link) Please sign in
          if(resend)
            form(id="resend-token" action="/auth/resend-vefication-token/true" method="post")
                input(hidden name='email', value=`${user.email}` type='text')
                button(type="submit"  class="btn submit-btn primary" style="padding:15px 28px") Send token again
        footer(class='primary footer')
          div
            i(class="fa-2x social  fab fa-twitter")
            i(class="fa-2x social  fab fa-linkedin")
            i(class="fa-2x social  fab fa-facebook-square")
            i(class="fa-2x social  fab fa-instagram")
          div(class='footer-credits')
            span Ⓒ 2019- 2020  
            span | W PROGRAMMING | 
            span  waldomilanes.com
          div developed by Waldo Milanes 
            span ®
script(src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/e89dd9bdb2.js" crossorigin="anonymous")
